metaData.label: KAM T1
metaData.criteriaDescription: target_Product_Priority exists in whole word KAM|T1

metaData.label: ohne Prevymis Banner
metaData.criteriaDescription: mainSpecialty equal AN OR mainSpecialty equal PHAHP OR mainSpecialty equal ECM OR mainSpecialty equal CPM OR mainSpecialty equal B

metaData.label: mit Prevymis Banner
metaData.criteriaDescription: mainSpecialty equal HEM OR mainSpecialty equal PA OR mainSpecialty equal MBV OR mainSpecialty equal INF
